plot: Having to fix a roof leak, Father Ted tries a raffle to raise money.

To raise money to mend the leaking roof Ted gets the bishop's permission to hold a raffle with a car as its star prize but he accidentally destroys the car. Aware that another priest has an identical car Ted borrows it and rigs the raffle for Dougal to win so that it can be returned to the owner. When Ted learns that the priest has died the pressure seems to be off but he has reckoned without the raffle's MC Father O'Dwyer, who is a gambling addict and buys 200 raffle tickets, and Father Jack, who steals the car to buy drink and writes it off.—don @ minifie-1
